005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundChoiceGroup;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundGroupedAssembly;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.ITargetedConstraintBase;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.IValueTargetedConstraintsBase;
018
019import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
020import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
021
022import java.util.LinkedList;
023import java.util.List;
024
025@SuppressWarnings({
026    "PMD.DataClass",
027    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
028})
029@MetaschemaAssembly(
030    name = "field-constraints",
031    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
032public class FieldConstraints implements IValueTargetedConstraintsBase {
033  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
034
035  @BoundAssembly(
036      formalName = "Constraint Let Expression",
037      useName = "let",
038      maxOccurs = -1,
039      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "lets", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
040  private List<ConstraintLetExpression> _lets;
041
042  @BoundChoiceGroup(
043      minOccurs = 1,
044      maxOccurs = -1,
045      assemblies = {
046          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Allowed Values Constraint", useName = "allowed-values",
047              binding = TargetedAllowedValuesConstraint.class),
048          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Expect Condition Constraint", useName = "expect",
049              binding = TargetedExpectConstraint.class),
050          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Targeted Index Has Key Constraint", useName = "index-has-key",
051              binding = TargetedIndexHasKeyConstraint.class),
052          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Value Matches Constraint", useName = "matches",
053              binding = TargetedMatchesConstraint.class)
054      },
055      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "rules", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
056  private List<? extends ITargetedConstraintBase> _rules;
057
058  public FieldConstraints() {
059    this(null);
060  }
061
062  public FieldConstraints(IMetaschemaData data) {
063    this.__metaschemaData = data;
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
068    return __metaschemaData;
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public List<ConstraintLetExpression> getLets() {
073    return _lets;
074  }
075
076  public void setLets(List<ConstraintLetExpression> value) {
077    _lets = value;
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Add a new {@link ConstraintLetExpression} item to the underlying collection.
082   *
083   * @param item
084   *          the item to add
085   * @return {@code true}
086   */
087  public boolean addLet(ConstraintLetExpression item) {
088    ConstraintLetExpression value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
089    if (_lets == null) {
090      _lets = new LinkedList<>();
091    }
092    return _lets.add(value);
093  }
094
095  /**
096   * Remove the first matching {@link ConstraintLetExpression} item from the
097   * underlying collection.
098   *
099   * @param item
100   *          the item to remove
101   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
102   */
103  public boolean removeLet(ConstraintLetExpression item) {
104    ConstraintLetExpression value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
105    return _lets != null && _lets.remove(value);
106  }
107
108  @Override
109  public List<? extends ITargetedConstraintBase> getRules() {
110    return _rules;
111  }
112
113  public void setRules(List<? extends ITargetedConstraintBase> value) {
114    _rules = value;
115  }
116
117  @Override
118  public String toString() {
119    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
120  }
121}
